prop.caption: click
prop.description: Fires when the user presses a mousebutton while over this element and then let's the mousebutton go.

prop.caption: mouseup
prop.description: Fires when the user lets go of a mousebutton while over this element.

prop.caption: mousedown
prop.description: Fires when the user presses a mousebutton while over this element.

prop.caption: keyup
prop.description: Fires when the user lets go of a keyboard button while this element is focussed.

prop.caption: clear
prop.description: Fires when the content of this element is cleared.
